extendedInfo.description: Test your skills at bending the Latin conjugations.-All five conjugations included-All three persons in both singular and plural-All tenses-Both regular and deponent verbs-Infinitive, imperative, indicative and subjunctive moods-More than 100 different verbs-Flashcards mode-Verbs, conjugations, tenses etc. that you fail on will appear more often-When you get them right, they appear less oftenIf you use and like this app, please consider donating. If I receive 100 donations, I pledge to add 30 more verbs, and the ability to enable/disable each verb individually in the options. Suggestions for what verbs to add are welcome.

reviews.title: excellent, useful, configurable
reviews.comment: This is excellent for practising Latin verb conjugations. One of its best features is the full set of options to control which types of verbs are used, so this is a useful tool for beginners who might have studied only one conjugation and one tense, and for advanced students who want to practice with them all.
reviews.author: Alice Harris

reviews.title: No fuss
reviews.comment: Simple, no BS and doesn\'t need any strange privileges.  Thanks!
reviews.author: K\303\245re Hviid

reviews.title: Great idea, but needs improvement to be great.
reviews.comment: I recommend this app if you have a) a fair grasp of Latin already, and b) are in search of a very Spartan app, but not for newbies or anyone looking for more than a basic verb catalogue.  While you can in fact customize a goodly number of options to determine which verbs are presented, that\'s really all you can do. I will reinstall (and happily pay for!) this app if functionality improves.  It will be perfect for those seeking a reading-list-style of verbs.
reviews.author: LadyMelissa Townsend

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I had this for a few months before I realised how versatile and  useful it is. If you\'re serious about Latin, this is for you. I would pay your it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Currently learning Latin at yr 12 level and I am finding this app very useful... easy way to refresh grammar in the car or when I just CBS studying...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is very helpful! You should include all of the verbs\' principle parts on here. It helps in determining what type of conjugation each one is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great for practice! Would be nice if there was an override to correct for typing mode
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app. It has helped me a lot. I just wish it listed all 4 principle parts of the verb. I\'d gladly pay for that. So download and enjoy. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s good to see an app to aid learning Latin,but this is pretty bad in not being able to recognise tiny variations in punctuation and vocab inanswers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I wish there were levels so it is easier to learn.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App confuses 2nd person indicative and imperative
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Difficulty can be adjusted in the settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Looks good, however my Latin is limited to auto and the like. Think I may need to learn Latin.
reviews.author: A Google User
